node.title: Snake on plane forces jet to divert
node.description: An AirAsia passenger plane was forced to make an unscheduled landing after a snake could be seen wriggling in the cabin's light fittings.
node.content: ["An AirAsia passenger plane was forced to divert and make an unscheduled landing after a snake was spotted slithering through the overhead lights, the Malaysian budget carrier confirmed Monday.", "In a viral video shared on TikTok, social media users were quick to link with Samuel L. Jackson cult classic \"Snakes on a Plane\", the creature's silhouette could be seen wriggling in the cabin's light fittings. \u00a0", "The incident, which the airline described as \"very rare\", took place last week aboard a flight from the capital Kuala Lumpur to Tawau, on the eastern coast of Borneo island.", "After the captain found out about the snake, he took \"appropriate action\" and landed in the city of Kuching \u2014 560 miles west of Tawau \u2014 so the plane could be fumigated, AirAsia said.", "The passengers then boarded another flight to continue their journey. \u00a0", "\"At no time was the safety of guests or crew at any risk,\" AirAsia chief safety officer Liong Tien Ling said in a statement.", "Social media users joked the incident was all-too-reminiscent of the 2006 action film that featured Jackson as an FBI agent trapped on a jet filled with venomous serpents.", "\"Snakes on a plane is real!!\" one user posted.", "Another commented on Facebook: \"One of my worst nightmares. Too scary for me.\"", "This is not the first time a snake has been spotted on a passenger plane. In 2017, a snake was found on a flight to Anchorage, Alaska, and in 2016, passengers on an Aeromexico flight to Mexico City were startled by a\u00a0bright green snake dropping out of one of the luggage bins.", "La vibora voladora...ja ja ja. Una experiencia \u00fanica en el Vuelo Torre\u00f3n-M\u00e9xico, vuelo 231 de Aerom\u00e9xico. Eso si...Prioridad en aterrizaje. pic.twitter.com/qwDk6Wtszw", "For Breaking News & Analysis Download the Free CBS News app"]
